description: Pre-computed BiomedCLIP vision embeddings for medical image classification. Replace these with actual embeddings computed from representative medical images.

conditions.name: Normal Chest X-Ray
conditions.description: No significant abnormalities detected in chest radiograph

conditions.name: Pneumonia
conditions.description: Lung infection with consolidation or infiltrates visible on imaging

conditions.name: Pleural Effusion
conditions.description: Abnormal fluid accumulation in the pleural space

conditions.name: Cardiomegaly
conditions.description: Enlarged cardiac silhouette on chest imaging

conditions.name: Atelectasis
conditions.description: Partial or complete collapse of lung tissue

conditions.name: Pneumothorax
conditions.description: Air in the pleural space causing lung collapse

conditions.name: Skin Lesion — Suspicious
conditions.description: Skin lesion with features requiring further evaluation

conditions.name: Retinal — Normal
conditions.description: Normal retinal appearance without pathological findings

conditions.name: Diabetic Retinopathy
conditions.description: Retinal damage from diabetes with microaneurysms or hemorrhages
